content.rendered:
Back
Buy newspaper

The Ultimate WordPress Theme

We are thrilled to introduce this Newspaper Theme update. You've asked us to help you improve the website performance for mobile devices. You've asked us to help you adapt your site to the current online environment rapid changes. We heard you. The update you've been waiting for is here!

The Newspaper 10.3.7 version introduces blazing-fast mobile pages and delightful flexibility in designing your content for small screens. Explore a series of features and improvements and get unprecedented speed. Dedicated pages, templates, & menus for mobile, automated analysis & management for fonts and 3 new PRO demos are waiting to boost your website's appearance. Scroll down to find more!

So, what’s new in Newspaper 10.3.7

Perfect Mobile Pages and Templates System

Creating a design for mobile with the Newspaper Theme is now fast and easy. For the first time ever, you can edit pages, articles, or templates and create a customized version, specially designed for mobile. All the power in the tagDiv Composer page builder adapts everything to help you create a fresh, stunning, immersive experience for your audience, right on the small screens.

Step into the future with a perfect mobile experience. It's easy to create designs for all small-screen devices with Newspaper Theme's latest capabilities. Explore your creativity and invite visitors to enjoy your content from any device!

Discover the new feature

Dynamic Fonts Analysis Tool

Quickly manage and optimize the fonts on your website! No more tedious searching for the fonts in use. You can see the analysis of all the fonts currently in use on a specific page or template. You can also dynamically change the fonts on sections or elements to increase the font consistency and speed-up the page.

3 New & Unique Professional Demos

Say Hello! to the 3 New Pro Demos and build your beautiful WordPress website in minutes! Try the perfect combination of lightweight architecture, enhanced performance, and stunning flexibility. Get inspired and jump-start your project today!

Garden PRO

View demo

The Garden PRO Demo is a beautiful design, suitable for hobby and environment-related sites. Go green!

Arette PRO

View demo

Arrete PRO Demo is an addictive visual website solution suitable for modern magazines. Charm you visitors!

Artist PRO

View demo

Discover the Artist PRO Demo and use it for artsy and fun websites that require a lot of color and vibrant elements!

See all the demos

Your satisfaction is our main priority

Newspaper is one of the top themes currently available on the WordPress platform, and I would have no hesitation in recommending it.

Wesley Dunn

Owner at Costas Online

I've had a great experience with the theme. It has made my passion as a travel blogger come true with ease. Thanks!

Tenaya Taylor

Owner at Cultured Black Eyed Pearl

Newspaper is a complete out-of-the-box WordPress theme, and also gives you the ability to fine-tune your website if you need it.

Maikel van Wijk

Owner at Hip&Hot

As always, our updates are FREE for clients. Enjoy!

Not a customer yet? Start today, and you'll understand why so many awesome people love Newspaper Theme.

Buy Newspaper

Full list of additions

  • new: Mobile Pages and Templates System - Create a new version of the homepage, a single template, or a light customized header version only for mobile;
  • new: Font Analysis Tool - the Website Manager has a new interface available in the tagDiv Composer page builder;
  • new: 3 New one-click installable PRO Demos created with the tagDiv Cloud Library & tagDiv Composer page builder:
  • new: Garden PRO
  • new: Arette PRO
  • new: Artist PRO
  • new: new, exciting Cloud Library templates;
  • improvement: We’ve updated the WPBakery plugin to the latest version;
  • improvement: We’ve updated the Revolution Slider plugin to the latest version;
  • improvement: Order Icons option on the Social Icons shortcode;
  • improvement: Added time to slide on the Newsticker element;
  • improvement: Whatsapp Web - the Whatsapp share icon now also appears on the desktop version;
  • fix: Smartlist with pagination;
  • fix: jQuery migrate warnings;
  • fix: Youtube playlist on the Mobile Theme;
  • fix: Pagination issue on the Mobile Theme;
  • fix: Featured image as background;
  • fix: Video Ad global title;
  • fix: Modal image option issue;
  • fix: Archive Cloud Template bug;
  • fix: Edit 404 template with the Yoast premium plugin bug;
  • fix: Social Sharing buttons when a Vimeo video is set in the post;
  • fix: other CSS changes;
